sub_title: International I Connector I Hospitality I Sales I People Management I Training I Development I Consultancy
summary:
HOSTMANSHIP - "The art of making PEOPLE feel welcome"

Niels is driven by a genuine passion for delivering exceptional service, building meaningful connections, and making a positive impact. 

Niels is a highly accomplished and results-driven professional with a diverse background in catering, event management, human resources, and education. He possesses a proven track record in leadership, strategic planning, and delivering exceptional hospitality services. Niels is deeply passionate about driving operational excellence and exceeding client expectations.

His biggest assets include his people-oriented and friendly service approach, his enthusiasm, his ability to multitask, and his no-nonsense attitude. He is known for his loyalty, determination, and persistence in getting the job done.

With an entrepreneurial and adventurous mindset, he had the opportunity to work and live, in various corners of the world, including countries within the European Union, Peru, South Africa, Zimbabwe, Botswana, Zambia, Kenya, Uganda, and the United States of America.

Throughout his career, Niels has successfully managed corporate catering operations, organized high-profile events, and implemented effective human resources strategies. He demonstrates a strong aptitude for team development, financial management, and client relationship management, resulting in outstanding customer satisfaction and repeat business.

In addition to his experience in the corporate sector, Niels excels in the education field as a study coach and internship coordinator. He leverages his expertise in guiding and mentoring students, ensuring their success in academic and professional pursuits.

Niels' international experience has further enhanced his adaptability, cultural awareness, and ability to thrive in diverse environments. He is a results-oriented professional dedicated to delivering exceptional service and achieving outstanding outcomes.

If you are seeking a dynamic professional with expertise in catering management, event coordination, and human resources, Niels invites you to connect with him to explore potential collaborations and opportunities

treasury_media.description: Wie ons banenlandschap bekijkt, ziet bijzondere functies voorbij komen. Een lab technician of een assemblagemedewerker: we hebben ze blijkbaar hard nodig, waar waarvoor en waarom? In deze serie vertelt elke week iemand over zijn of haar beroep....

treasury_media.description: De meeste mbo- en hbo-studenten moeten voor hun opleiding een aantal weken stage lopen, dé kans om al je opgedane kennis in de praktijk te brengen. Bovendien kan een geslaagde stage je een voordeel geven op de arbeidsmarkt. Maar het vinden van een...

treasury_media.title: Campaigner Personality
treasury_media.description:
It doesn’t interest me what you do for a living. I want to know what you ache for – and if you dare to dream of meeting your heart’s longing. It doesn’t interest me how old you are. I want to know if you will risk looking like a fool – for love – for your dreams – for the adventure of being alive.
Oriah Mountain Dreamer

profile_positions.description:
At this law firm NautaDutilh located in Amsterdam's Zuidas and Rotterdam's Weena, we provide lunch for 300-400 guests daily. Our self-service restaurant focuses on fresh experiences, high-quality products, optimal service, and hospitality. In addition to the restaurant, we also manage the espresso bar and banquet parties.

The team at Nauta Amsterdam and Rotterdam consists of 15 dedicated colleagues. Together, we strive for the best service and products. No day is the same at these high-class locations!

As a general manager, I am responsible for all aspects of hospitality and service, including team development, business, operations, finance, and administration at our corporate locations. I lead a large operational team, motivating and inspiring them to ensure smooth daily operations. With my background and knowledge in hospitality, I know how to challenge the team to deliver maximum quality. I am skilled at multitasking and, together with my colleagues, I aim to elevate the guest experience to a higher level. Moreover, I am a valued partner in discussions with clients and the business unit manager. Each location has its own identity, and I enjoy the challenge of adapting to them. I ensure an appropriate response to factors that can influence the profitability of business activities, both positively and negatively. In short, entrepreneurship is the key to success.

•	New business through fundraising and business networking

•	Responsible for several outreach campaigns/ recruitments of scholars and volunteers 
•	Assist the companies’ president with private projects 
•	Responsible for non-cash art donations to the organization (appraisals/photography/ documentation)


Founded in 1946 in Chicago , by Franklin Mc Lean. (PHD/MD). Our primary goal is to achieve equity of opportunity in medicine and equity of access to quality healthcare for all groups in American society by increasing the number of minority physicians and changing the face of medicine to better reflect and serve our diverse nation.

My duties:
NMF has more than 17,000 verified alumni in its network and seeks to develop a new revenue stream by developing continuing education courses, medical missions and online content delivery.
 
NMF is in the process of developing a new initiative which is the placement and organization of medical and pre medical and health personnel in practice locations in Ghana and Kenya and perhaps other African locations. 

This is the practical application of Educational Tourism but in an applied and somewhat different environment

volunteer_experiences.description:
The People for Ukajede Foundation was started in 2004 and is a non-profitorganisation (NPO 037-504) which seeks to improve pre-school education for underprivileged children. This enables them to be school ready and achieve the most out of their schooling career. “Ukajede” is an acronym for the 5 informal settlements in which the foundation operates, namely; Ulana; Kanana; Angelo; Jerusalem and Delmore – all situated in the East of Johannesburg. These settlements have an estimated total population of 80 000 inhabitants living in crude shacks without any sewerage, electricity, running water, garbage collection, healthcare or schools. A large percentage of the shacks house families with no adults. The eldest child, usually not older than 10 years of age, has to try and find food and also protect the younger children.

The Ukajede Foundation supports 9 crèches in this informal settlement; supplying each school with the means to prepare a warm meal for each child daily, stationery; cleaning material and maintenance assistance

Organizing, hosting and lead  for the Dutch  Kingsday, European Cup, World Cup games  by the Dutch for the people!  
Venue spotting, negotiating deals and sponsors.
